problem.markdown:
At a particular state, pressure given is more than the saturation pressure for the given temperature(200 deg C). The given state is in ________ zone
[x] Subcooled liquid [ ] Supercritical fluid [x] Compressed liquid [ ] Superheated vapour
problem.p: At a particular state, pressure given is more than the saturation pressure for the given temperature(200 deg C). The given state is in ________ zone
